item.title: Write the Minimum Necessary Code In Your Unit Test Case That Makes It Valuable
item.description: Maintainability is of major importance in software development. Usually writing tests against your codebase increases maintainability in that it gives you some degree of freedom in making changes, at the same time assuring you did not break any existing logic.
